entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Risk of freezing rain over northern sections overnight. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
